summary: An ordinance relating to the Water Department; providing for the construction of a supply main in East 83rd Street, from the Maple Leaf Intermediate Service Reservoir, east of Roosevelt Way, to 5th Avenue Northeast, and certain other streets and avenues, including pumping installations; making an appropriation from the surplus in the Water Fund therefor; repealing Ordinance No. 77142, and ratifying and confirming the expenditures made therefrom.
